bropals.lib.simplegame.math

Class Matrix3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.math.Matrix3D

  • public class Matrix3D
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a 3x3 matrix.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Matrix3D

        public Matrix3D()
        Creates a 2x3 matrix of the form

        [ 1 0 0 ]
        [ 0 1 0 ]
        [ 0 0 1 ]

      • Matrix3D

        public Matrix3D(float m00,
                float m01,
                float m02,
                float m10,
                float m11,
                float m12,
                float m20,
                float m21,

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set(float m00,
                float m01,
                float m02,
                float m10,
                float m11,
                float m12,
                float m20,
                float m21,
                float m22)
        Sets the values of the matrix. It will be in the form

        [ m00 m01 m02 ]
        [ m10 m11 m12 ]
        [ m20 m21 m22 ]

        Parameters:
        m00 - row 1 column 1
        m01 - row 1 column 2
        m02 - row 1 column 3
        m10 - row 2 column 1
        m11 - row 2 column 2
        m12 - row 2 column 3
        m20 - row 3 column 1
        m21 - row 3 column 2
        m22 - row 3 column 3

      • multiply

        public Matrix3D multiply(float scalar)
        Creates a new matrix that is this matrix scaled by the given factor.
        Parameters:
        scalar - the number to scale the matrix by
        Returns:
        the scaled matrix

      • multiplyLocal

        public void multiplyLocal(float scalar)
        Scales this matrix by the given factor.
        Parameters:
        scalar - the number to scale the matrix by

      • concatenate

        public Matrix3D concatenate(Matrix3D o)
        Creates a new Matrix3D that is the concatenation of this matrix to the other. (this * other)
        Parameters:
        o - the other matrix.
        Returns:
        the concatenation of these two matrices.

      • transform

        public Vector2D transform(Vector2D v)
        Transforms the given vector by this matrix, return the new vector. No Z component is needed for this transformation.
        Parameters:
        v - the vector to transform by this matrix.
        Returns:
        the transformation.

      • transformLocal

        public void transformLocal(Vector2D v)
        Transforms the given vector by this matrix, setting it to the transformed version. No Z component is needed for this transformation.
        Parameters:
        v - the vector to transform by this matrix, and set to the result.

      • translate

        public void translate(float x,
                      float y)
        A faster way to cause a translation to occur on this matrix. Use this if possible.
        Parameters:
        x - the x translation
        y - the y translation

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float angle)
        A faster way to cause a rotation to occur on this matrix. Use this if possible.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle to rotate this matrix by

      • determinant

        public float determinant()
        Calculates and returns the determinant of this matrix.
        Returns:
        the determinant of this matrix.

      • hasInverse

        public boolean hasInverse()
        Determines if this matrix has an inverse.
        Returns:
        if the matrix has an inverse

      • inverse

        public Matrix3D inverse()
        Calculates and returns the inverse of this matrix, if it has one. If this matrix does not have an inverse, then it returns null
        Returns:
        the inverse of this matrix.

      • createTranslationMatrix

        public static Matrix3D createTranslationMatrix(float x,
                                               float y)
        Creates a translation matrix.
        Parameters:
        x - the x translation.
        y - the y translation.
        Returns:
        the matrix that represents a translation.

        Creates a rotation matrix to rotate about the z axis.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle to rotate
        Returns:
        the matrix that represents a rotation.

      • createScalingMatrix

        public static Matrix3D createScalingMatrix(float x,
                                           float y)
        Creates a scaling matrix to scale space.
        Parameters:
        x - the x factor to scale space by
        y - the y factor to scale space by.
        Returns:
        the matrix that represents a scaling of space.
